dynamodb_table_name.description: DynamoDB table used to store processed announcements

sns_topic_arn.description: SNS topic used for fan-out notifications

announcements.description: Map of announcement IDs to Telegram destination configuration

app_name.description: Application name/prefix used for resource naming

base_url.description: Base URL where announcements are published

date_format.description: Date format used in announcements filenames

schedule_expression.description: CloudWatch Events / EventBridge schedule expression to trigger the check_announcement lambda

telegram_auth_token.description: Telegram bot auth token stored in SSM Parameter Store
